about_the_game:
Official soundtrack to "Ambre - a heartbreaking kinetic novel" by Kimino and Roganis.

01 - On the other side of the window
02 - Orange and Grey
03 - Carnaval des doudous
04 - Broken Dream
05 - Hospital Corridors
06 - Endless Road
07 - Sanglot des violons de l'automne

After downloading the DLC, you will find the soundtrack inside the game’s root directory.
detailed_description:
Official soundtrack to "Ambre - a heartbreaking kinetic novel" by Kimino and Roganis.

01 - On the other side of the window
02 - Orange and Grey
03 - Carnaval des doudous
04 - Broken Dream
05 - Hospital Corridors
06 - Endless Road
07 - Sanglot des violons de l'automne

After downloading the DLC, you will find the soundtrack inside the game’s root directory.

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
